greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Start a spiral of numbers on a hexagonal tiling, with the initial hexagon as a(1) = 1. a(n) is the smallest positive integer not equal to or previously adjacent to its neighbors.
comment: This is the hexagonal analog to A260643.
link: Peter Kagey, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Peter Kagey, Ruby program for computing sequence.
